name: Morg
description:
Morg is a real-time online multiplayer text experience. Once Morg is done, it's done.
Visit http://weeklygamejam.com/morg at the right time to play before it ends.

Start Date
The game starts Sunday April 14th - 7 PM EDT

YourBr0ther's Indie Sundae
Join or watch a recording of the stream: http://www.twitch.tv/YourBr0ther

Weekly Game Jam
Made for The Weekly Game Jam #91 : Detective Text Adventure

Donations
Donations are welcome. Name your own price. Use Download button to start.
